products.title: Sahara Pvc Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Their sahara pvc blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. This hard-wearing white pvc roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardent and waterproof, perfect for kitchens or bathrooms. Product id: sdb-rbx2155 fabric colour: white material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes sahara pvc blackout white roller blind in white.
